scripts.local-dev: npm run support-services && export DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:pw@localhost:5432/ecr_viewer_db && npm run dev
scripts.support-services: DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/amd64 && docker-compose build && docker compose up db ecr-viewer validation-service fhir-converter-service ingestion-service  message-parser-service -d && docker-compose logs
